TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComSoapPublisher

summary.span: 發行啟用 SOAP 之 COM+ 應用程式的 COM 介面。

span.span: Publishes COM interfaces for SOAP-enabled COM+ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作是; 請參閱該主題取得詳細資訊。The implementation of is ; see that topic for specifics. 為.NET framework 內部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 您不需要在您的程式碼中直接使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateMailBox (string RootMailServer, string MailBox, out string SmtpName, out string Domain, out string PhysicalPath, out string Error);

Public Sub CreateMailBox (RootMailServer As String, MailBox As String, ByRef SmtpName As String, ByRef Domain As String, ByRef PhysicalPath As String, ByRef Error As String)

public: void CreateMailBox(System::String ^ RootMailServer, System::String ^ MailBox, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % SmtpName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % Domain, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % PhysicalPath, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % Error);

param.name: RootMailServer
param.span: 根郵件伺服器的 URL。

span.span: The URL for the root mail server.

param.name: MailBox
param.span: 要建立的信箱。

span.span: The mailbox to create.

param.name: SmtpName
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含內含信箱的 Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) 伺服器名稱。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the name of the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) server containing the mailbox.

param.name: Domain
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含 SMTP 伺服器的網域。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the domain of the SMTP server.

param.name: PhysicalPath
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含信箱的檔案系統路徑。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the file system path for the mailbox.

param.name: Error
param.span: 如果遇到問題，則這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含錯誤訊息。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains an error message if a problem was encountered.

summary.span: 在指定的 URL 建立啟用 SOAP 的 COM+ 應用程式信箱。

span.span: Creates a SOAP-enabled COM+ application mailbox at a specified URL.
Not fully implemented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未完整實作。目前，不會建立信箱。Not fully implemented; does not currently create a mailbox. 傳回的錯誤訊息 「 COM + SOAP 服務不支援 SMTP 發行集 」。Returns the error message "COM+ SOAP services SMTP publication is not supported."

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetAssemblyNameForCache (string TypeLibPath, out string CachePath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetAssemblyNameForCache(string TypeLibPath, [out] string& CachePath) cil managed
Public Sub GetAssemblyNameForCache (TypeLibPath As String, ByRef CachePath As String)
public: void GetAssemblyNameForCache(System::String ^ TypeLibPath, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % CachePath);

param.name: TypeLibPath
param.span: 含有 typelib 之檔案的路徑。

span.span: The path for the file that contains the typelib.

param.name: CachePath
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含 SoapCache 目錄中 Proxy 組件的完整路徑。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the full path of the proxy assembly in the SoapCache directory.

summary.span: 傳回 SoapCache 目錄中以強式名稱簽名所產生組件的完整路徑。

span.span: Returns the full path for a strong-named signed generated assembly in the SoapCache directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unmanaged COM + 元件已發佈，透過 SOAP 端點的.NET 遠端處理，必須可讓.NET Framework 中使用的 unmanaged 的元件會產生 proxy。For an unmanaged COM+ component to be published through .NET remoting as a SOAP endpoint, a proxy needs to be generated to make the unmanaged components available to the .NET Framework. 這樣做，以程式設計方式執行相同的步驟，做為類型程式庫匯入工具 (Tlbimp.exe)，[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]工具，用於 proxy 的中繼資料組件轉換成 unmanaged 的 COM + 型別程式庫。This is done by programmatically performing the same steps as Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe), the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] tool that is used to convert unmanaged COM+ type libraries to proxy metadata assemblies. 不過，對於透過成功的 SOAP 用戶端啟用，用戶端和伺服器電腦必須共用相同的強式名稱簽章的中繼資料 proxy。For client activation over SOAP to succeed, however, client and server machines must share the same strong-named signed metadata proxies. 基於這個理由，受管理的 proxy 組件時產生的 unmanaged COM + 元件，強式名稱金鑰也產生並用於登入 proxy 的組件。For this reason, when a managed proxy assembly is generated for an unmanaged COM+ component, a strong name key is also generated and used to sign the proxy assembly.

exception.span: 為 。

exception.span: 例如，在以 Windows 為基礎的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.

exception.span: 在字串的中間包含一個冒號 (:)。

span.span: contains a colon (:) in the middle of the string.

summary.span: 處理用戶端型別程式庫，並在用戶端建立組態檔。

span.span: Processes a client type library, creating a configuration file on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法在用戶端 proxy 匯入用於產生遠端組態檔。This method is used on a client proxy import to generate a remoting configuration file. 在實作中，如果`Mode`參數為"wellknownobject"或空字串 ("")，會假設已知的物件。否則，會假設用戶端啟用。In the implementation, if the `Mode` parameter is either "wellknownobject" or an empty string (""), a well-known object is assumed; otherwise, client activation is assumed. 建議來取代。It is recommended that be used instead of .

span.span: Processes a server type library, either adding or deleting component entries to the Web.config and Default.disco files.
Generates a proxy if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會產生 COM + 元件的 Web.config 和 Default.disco 檔案項目。Generates Web.config and Default.disco file entries for COM+ components. 若有必要則產生 Proxy。Generates a proxy if necessary. 建議和來取代。It is recommended that and be used instead of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作使用組件註冊工具 (Regasm.exe) 來註冊組件中可建立的類別。The implementation of uses the Assembly Registration tool (Regasm.exe) to register the creatable classes in the assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。For more information, see [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void UnRegisterAssembly (string AssemblyPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnRegisterAssembly(string AssemblyPath) cil managed
Public Sub UnRegisterAssembly (AssemblyPath As String)
public: void UnRegisterAssembly(System::String ^ AssemblyPath);

param.name: AssemblyPath
param.span: 組件的檔案系統路徑。

span.span: The file system path for the assembly.

summary.span: 移除 COM Interop 組件的註冊。

span.span: Unregisters a COM interop assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作使用 Regasm.exe 取消登錄組件中可建立的類別。The implementation of uses Regasm.exe to unregister the creatable classes in the assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。For more information, see [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md).

exception.span: 呼叫鏈結中的呼叫端沒有存取 Unmanaged 程式碼的使用權限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
-or-

span.span: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences, or the assembly name is longer than MAX_PATH characters.
